    • be.kdg.processor.fine.services.FineCalculationService

public class FineCalculationService
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • calcEmissionFine

        java.util.Optional<Fine> calcEmissionFine​(Camera camera,
                                          Licenseplate licenseplate,
                                          double emissionFineFactor,
                                          int paymentDeadlineDays)
        Method that calculates and creates the EmissionFine for the FineService.
        Parameters:
        camera - camera that holds information for the Fine calculation
        licenseplate - license plate that needs to be fined
        emissionFineFactor - price of the EmissionFine
        paymentDeadlineDays - timeframe (of # days) in which the EmissionFine must be paid by the owner
        Returns:
        an Optional EmissionFine

      • calcSpeedFine

        java.util.Optional<Fine> calcSpeedFine​(java.util.Map.Entry<CameraMessage,CameraMessage> messagePair,
                                       java.util.LinkedList<Camera> cameras,
                                       Licenseplate licenseplate,
                                       double speedFineFactorSlow,
                                       double speedFineFactorFast,
                                       int paymentDeadlineDays)
        Method that calculates and creates the SpeedingFine for the FineService. Speeding fine amount gets calculated according to current laws: https://www.wegcode.be/boetetarieven
        Parameters:
        messagePair - pair of CameraMessages that contain information for the Fine calculation
        cameras - list of cameras that hold information for the Fine calculation
        licenseplate - license plate that needs to be fined
        speedFineFactorSlow - Fine factor that is used for the price when the speeding violation happened in a zone with a speed limit <= 50 km/h
        speedFineFactorFast - Fine factor that is used for the price when the speeding violation happened in a zone with a speed limit > 50 km/h
        paymentDeadlineDays - timeframe (of # days) in which the EmissionFine must be paid by the owner
        Returns:
        an Optional SpeedingFine. Optional will be empty when the speed is lower than the speed limit.

      • calcSpeed

        private java.lang.Double calcSpeed​(double distance,
                                   java.time.LocalDateTime timestamp1,
                                   java.time.LocalDateTime timestamp2)
